game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is currency, the rich live forever and the poor are left with mere moments to live. You play as Aria, a skilled thief who has managed to cheat fate by living beyond her allotted time.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Chronos, where Aria has been hired for one final heist. Her target is the legendary clockwork device known as the "Heart of Time," which grants its wielder unimaginable power over the very fabric of existence.
game.ending: With the Heart of Time in hand, Aria must navigate a world that's unraveling around her. She'll need to confront her past and make impossible choices to prevent a catastrophic future where time itself is broken. Will she be able to restore balance to the timestream, or will the fabric of reality tear apart?
